snippet.title: Oneiro Man - Oficial Trailer
snippet.description:
Oneiro Man is a game where you play as an office worker forced to stay overnight writing reports to avoid getting fired. The game combines typing mechanics with various mini-games that break the monotony of the gameplay. It lasts about 40 minutes, but it features 4 different endings, multiple achievements, and more. The game is completely free on steam.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3146700
